name: Super Mega Chain Turbo EX
description:
Made for Climax Game Jam 2022

Click to collect same Shape to build chain.  More Chain = More Score.
Click to make explosion to keep shapes in play.  More in play = More Score.
If Shape leaves play, Chain is broken.
Reach Score Target in Time Limit to Level Up.  More Level = More Score.
Run out of Time = Game Over.
